content: kirby 33rd anniversary special a cute amigurumi of elfilin from kirby and the forgotten land he was the other half of the beast id-f86 pretty cute compared to that monster but he gets a little naggy once you win the meta knight cup and the meta knight present code while passing the colosseum right okay okay- i know you admire meta knight as much as i do come to think of it her right ear looks a bit deformed like id-f86 and i like it the pattern won t make it like that but if you like how it looks i forgot how to make it look like that sorry anyway here are the materials you need worsted weight yarn 4 medium in the following colors - aqua - pink the finished product is approximately 23cm tall i used a crochet hook size f-3 75mm you ll also need a tapestry needle fiber fill and some things to make the facial features such as yarn or felt feel free to tell me how it goes about putting plastic pellets or some other weighty thing in the feet bottom and tail to help him stand up i have never tried it this pattern uses less than one skein of each color let me know if you have any questions concerns or comments
